Package com.example.wellfed.common

Class AdapterDataObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.AdapterDataObserver
      • com.example.wellfed.common.AdapterDataObserver
  • public class AdapterDataObserver
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.AdapterDataObserver
    The AdapterDataObserver class extends RecyclerView.AdapterDataObserver to provide a listener for changes in RecyclerView.Adapter data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  AdapterDataObserver.OnAdapterDataChangedListener
      The OnDataChangedListener interface requires a handler for changes in RecyclerView.Adapter data.
